cabin_44_18.discovery_notes: Collapsed timber frame, door ripped free. Cold ash in the hearth.

watchtower_45_18.discovery_notes: A wooden watchtower crests the ridge. A faded banner flaps once.

campfire_37_18.discovery_notes: Old embers and cracked stones. Someone rested here recently.

grave_47_18.discovery_notes: Three stones placed carefully in pine shade. No names, no markers.
